# WellUp - Healthy Lifestyle Management Platform

## Project Overview
- **Project Name**: Well Up
- **Purpose**: Help polytechnic students lead a healthier lifestyle and manage their schedules better
- **Target Audience**: Polytechnic students struggling with irregular schedules, diet, exercise, sleep, stress management, and personal grooming
- **Impact**: Improve physical health, mental wellbeing, and academic performance

## Technical Stack
- HTML5
- CSS3 (with vibrant, innovative color palette)
- Vanilla JavaScript
- Live Server for development

## Development Guidelines
- Use semantic HTML5 elements
- Maintain responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Focus on accessibility and user experience
- Keep code clean and well-commented
- Follow modern web development best practices

## Color Palette
- Use vibrant, innovative colors that inspire health and wellness
- Primary: Energetic and motivating tones
- Secondary: Calming and supportive colors
- Accent: Action-oriented highlights

## Key Features
- Health tracking and habit formation
- Schedule management
- Wellness tips and resources
- Progress visualization
- User-friendly interface optimized for busy students
